Module com.cse.ai.othellogame
Package com.cse.ai.othellogame.gui.gamescreen

Class GameScreen

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
com.cse.ai.othellogame.gui.gamescreen.GameScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class GameScreen extends javafx.scene.layout.Pane implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is the main class for the game screen; it will hold the game board, the score board and the game system.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameScreen

      public GameScreen(Board board, String playerBlackName, String playerWhiteName, Player playerBlack, Player playerWhite)
      Constructs a GameScreen object.
      Parameters:
      board - The game board.
      playerBlackName - The name of the black player.
      playerWhiteName - The name of the white player.
      playerBlack - The black player.
      playerWhite - The white player.

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(boolean updateTurn, boolean withHints)
      Updates the game screen based on the current state of the game board.
      Parameters:
      updateTurn - Whether to update the turn or not.
      withHints - Whether to show hints for human player or not.

    • updateTurn

      private void updateTurn()
      Updates the turn of the current player on the score boards.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • getStyleableNode

      public javafx.scene.Node getStyleableNode()
      Specified by:
      getStyleableNode in interface javafx.css.Styleable

    • restartGame

      public void restartGame()
      Restarts the game. It shows a dialog box to confirm the restart.

    • closeGame

      public void closeGame()
      Closes the game application. It shows a dialog box to confirm the close.

    • mainMenu

      public void mainMenu()
      Goes back to the main menu. It shows a dialog box to confirm the action.

    • dialogBox

      private void dialogBox(String title)
      Shows a dialog box with the given title.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the dialog box.

    • setDialogBoxResponse

      public void setDialogBoxResponse(boolean response, String title)
      Sets the response of the dialog box and the action based on that response.
      Parameters:
      response - The response of the dialog box.
      title - The title of the dialog box, to determine what action to do.

    • showNoHints

      public void showNoHints()
      Shows a message to the user that the current player doesn't have any possible moves.
      The gameSystem will remove the message and change the turn to the next player after 0.6 second.

    • removeNoHints

      public void removeNoHints()
      Removes the message that the current player doesn't have any possible moves as its turn was switched.

    • gameEnded

      public void gameEnded()
      Show the result screen after the game is ended.
